import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Cart = () => { const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Premium Leather Jacket', category: 'clothes', price: 299, size: 'M', color: 'Black', quantity: 1, image: 'jacket.jpg', stock: 15 }, { id: 2, name: 'Designer Handbag', category: 'accessories', price: 159, size: 'One Size', color: 'Brown', quantity: 2, image: 'handbag.jpg', stock: 8 }, { id: 3, name: 'Classic Sneakers', category: 'shoes', price: 120, size: '42', color: 'White', quantity: 1, image: 'sneakers.jpg', stock: 12 } ]); const updateQuantity = (id, newQuantity) => { if (newQuantity < 1) return; setCartItems(items => items.map(item => item.id === id ? { ...item, quantity: newQuantity } : item ) ); }; const removeItem = (id) => { setCartItems(items => items.filter(item => item.id !== id)); }; const subtotal = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + (item.price * item.quantity), 0); const shipping = subtotal > 100 ? 0 : 15; const tax = subtotal * 0.08; // 8% tax const total = subtotal + shipping + tax; if (cartItems.length === 0) { return (

Your cart is empty

Looks like you haven't added any items to your cart yet.

Start Shopping
); } return (
{/* Page Header */}

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length} items in your cart

{/* Cart Items */}
{cartItems.map((item, index) => (
{/* Product Image */}
{item.name}
{/* Product Details */}
{item.name}

{item.category}

Size: {item.size} Color: {item.color}

${item.price}

{/* Quantity Controls */}
{item.quantity}
{/* Remove Button */}
{/* Item Total */}

Subtotal: ${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}

))}
{/* Continue Shopping */}
Continue Shopping
{/* Order Summary */}

Order Summary

Subtotal ({cartItems.length} items) ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Shipping {shipping === 0 ? 'FREE' : `$${shipping.toFixed(2)}`}
Tax ${tax.toFixed(2)}
{shipping === 0 && subtotal < 100 && (
ðŸŽ‰ You qualify for free shipping!
)} {shipping > 0 && (
Add ${(100 - subtotal).toFixed(2)} more for free shipping
)}
Total ${total.toFixed(2)}
{/* Promo Code */}
{/* Checkout Button */} Proceed to Checkout {/* Security Info */}
Secure Checkout

Your payment information is encrypted and secure

); }; export default Cart;
